insert into commodity (memberId,commodityCategory1,commodityCategory2,commodityCategory3,commodityName,brand,price,quantity,color,size,saleState,picture1,picture2,picture3,picture4,picture5,createTime,createOpt,updateTime,updateOpt) values (#{memberId},#{commodityCategory1},#{commodityCategory2},#{commodityCategory3},#{commodityName},#{brand},#{price},#{quantity},#{color},#{size},#{saleState},#{picture1},#{picture2},#{picture3},#{picture4},#{picture5},now(),#{createOpt},now(),#{updateOpt})

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into commodity_show (commodityId,commodityIntroduction,packingSpecification,instructions,customerService,showPagePath,showPageSource,createTime,createOpt,updateTime,updateOpt) values (#{commodityId},#{commodityIntroduction},#{packingSpecification},#{instructions},#{customerService},#{showPagePath},#{showPageSource},now(),#{createOpt},now(),#{updateOpt})
mapper.select: select a.id,ca.categoryName commodityCategory1, cb.categoryName commodityCategory2,cc.categoryName commodityCategory3, a.commodityName,ifnull(a.brand,'') brand,a.quantity,ifnull(a.uom,'') uom, ifnull(a.color,'') color,ifnull(a.size,'') size,a.price, a.goodFlg,a.hotFlg,a.choiceFlg,a.appreciateFlg,a.memberId from commodity a inner join commodityCategoryA ca on a.commodityCategory1 = ca.id inner join commodityCategoryB cb on a.commodityCategory2 = cb.id inner join commodityCategoryC cc on a.commodityCategory3 = cc.id where a.index_status = '0'
mapper.update: update commodity a set a.index_status = '1' where a.index_status = '0'
mapper.select:
select base.*,b.commodityIntroduction,b.packingSpecification,b.instructions,b.customerService, b.showPagePath,b.showPageSource,basec.*,d.quantityStart,d.quantityEnd,d.price priceList, e.color colorList,f.size sizeList from ( select a.id commodityId,a.memberId,ca.categoryName commodityCategory1, cb.categoryName commodityCategory2,cc.categoryName commodityCategory3, a.commodityName,a.brand,a.price,a.quantity,a.uom,a.color,a.size,a.saleState,a.goodFlg,a.hotFlg, a.choiceFlg,a.appreciateFlg,a.picture1,a.picture2,a.picture3,a.picture4,a.picture5 from commodity a left join commodityCategoryA ca on a.commodityCategory1 = ca.id left join commodityCategoryB cb on a.commodityCategory2 = cb.id left join commodityCategoryC cc on a.commodityCategory3 = cc.id where 1=1 and a.id in
#{id}
) base left join commodity_show b on base.commodityId = b.commodityId left join (select c.id,c.memberName,c.logoPath,c.topPicPath,c.reputation,c.guarantee,c.highQuality, c.sincerity,returnGoods,c.province,c.city,c.area,c.address,c.mobile,c.phone,c.email, c.fax,c.qq,c.isRel from member c) basec on base.memberId = basec.id left join commodity_price d on base.commodityId = d.commodityId left join commodity_color e on base.commodityId = e.commodityId left join commodity_size f on base.commodityId = f.commodityId order by
base.hotFlg asc,
base.hotFlg desc,
base.price asc,
base.price desc,
base.createTime asc,
base.createTime desc,
basec.isRel desc, basec.reputation desc, base.commodityId desc
